title: Demonic ashes
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Demonic ashes

Demonic ashes may refer to:

  • Fiendish ashes give 10 Prayer experience when scattered and are dropped by low-level demon-like monsters, such as
    • Imps
    • Different types of fiends
    • Spawns from other demons
  • Vile ashes give 25 Prayer experience when scattered and are dropped by low-level true demons, like
    • All types of Lesser and Greater demons
    • Hellhounds and their variants
    • All Bloodvelds
  • Malicious ashes give 65 Prayer experience when scattered and are dropped by mid-level demons, such as
    • Black and Jungle Demons
    • Demonic gorillas
    • Nechryaels
    • The Zamorakian God Wars bodyguards - Balfrug Kreeyath, Tstanon Karlak, and Zakl'n Gritch
  • Abyssal ashes give 85 Prayer experience when scattered and are dropped by high-level abyssal demons, namely
    • Abyssal demons (and Greater abyssal demons)
    • Abyssal Sires
  • Infernal ashes give 110 Prayer experience when scattered and are dropped only by high-level demon bosses, currently
    • K'ril Tsutsaroth
    • Cerberus
    • Skotizo
    • Zalcano
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:

'''Demonic ashes''' may refer to:

* {{plink|Fiendish ashes}} give 10 [[Prayer]] experience when scattered and are dropped by low-level demon-like monsters, such as
** [[Imp]]s
** Different types of [[fiend]]s
** Spawns from other demons
* {{plink|Vile ashes}} give 25 [[Prayer]] experience when scattered and are dropped by low-level true demons, like
** All types of [[Lesser demon|Lesser]] and [[Greater demon]]s
** [[Hellhound]]s and their variants
** All [[Bloodveld]]s
* {{plink|Malicious ashes}} give 65 [[Prayer]] experience when scattered and are dropped by mid-level demons, such as
** [[Black demon|Black]] and [[Jungle Demon]]s
** [[Demonic gorilla]]s
** [[Nechryael]]s
** The [[Zamorak]]ian [[God Wars Dungeon|God Wars]] bodyguards - [[Balfrug Kreeyath]], [[Tstanon Karlak]], and [[Zakl'n Gritch]]
* {{plink|Abyssal ashes}} give 85 [[Prayer]] experience when scattered and are dropped by high-level abyssal demons, namely
** [[Abyssal demon]]s (and [[Greater abyssal demon]]s)
** [[Abyssal Sire]]s
* {{plink|Infernal ashes}} give 110 [[Prayer]] experience when scattered and are dropped only by high-level demon bosses, currently
** [[K'ril Tsutsaroth]]
** [[Cerberus]]
** [[Skotizo]]
** [[Zalcano]]
